message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the given financial statements.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that the "Cost of Goods Sold" represents the value of inventory that was sold during the period. This is the standard accounting practice - when inventory is sold, its cost is recognized as an expense called "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS).

From the income statement, I can see:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 3250000.00 | 2024-01-29 |

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is $3,250,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3250000.00'} }
```
